headline: United Airlines (UAL): Reviewing Valuation After Upbeat Analyst Calls and Premium Travel Growth Expectations
summary: United Airlines Holdings (UAL) has climbed into the spotlight after a wave of upbeat analyst calls positioned the carrier as a preferred way to play an improving airline cycle and premium travel demand. See our latest analysis for United Airlines Holdings. That bullish backdrop seems to be showing up in the numbers, with a 1 month share price return of about 23 percent helping lift year to date share price gains to roughly 18 percent and supported by a powerful 3 year total shareholder return...
